subject: Black window app
description_text:
Hello, 




do you know how to fix this ??

conversations.body_text: Hi Filip Jägermann,     This issue is usually caused by missing or corrupted files, which can lead to abnormal window behavior. Please exit and uninstall the current software, then download and install the latest version Simsonn Manager 2.1.2 from our official website. If the problem persists after reinstallation, please compress the “log” folder in the Simsonn Manager installation directory and send it to us — we’ll help you check and identify the root        https://www.simsonn.com/pages/download
